applicationArn.description: (Optional) Application ARN for an Amazon Pinpoint application. Conflicts with `external_id` and `role_arn`.

applicationId.description: (Optional) Application ID for an Amazon Pinpoint application.

externalId.description: (Optional) ID for the Analytics Configuration. Conflicts with `application_arn`.

roleArn.description: (Optional) ARN of an IAM role that authorizes Amazon Cognito to publish events to Amazon Pinpoint analytics. Conflicts with `application_arn`.

userDataShared.description: (Optional) If set to `true`, Amazon Cognito will include user data in the events it publishes to Amazon Pinpoint analytics.
